description:
Hi! Hope you enjoy two kind of little more "unusual" Hubble pictures:

NGC 3603 (near of Statue of Liberty Nebula - NGC 3576) - five different filters to deal with: infrared F164n (FeII) and F128n (Paschen Beta), F673n (SII), F656n (Ha but good for OIII :-)) and F555w (V), but I have to make three different images with different filters; "nice" colors and "fair" star shapes are the most difficult things to achieve here...I think the final result looks like some picture extracted from a Sci-Fi Comic Book :-)

The other image was stored at my "Staging Area", and I think worth be published, because is inspired at Steven Marx image at the early year of 2013 - >
https://www.astrobin.com/28672/?nc=user
...its NGC 2440, a planetary nebula !

Hope you guys and girls appreciate these curious images ...and Im really sorry to publish only processed attempts of Hubble Images these days !!!
title: Two Hubble Images: Inside NGC 3603 and Planetary Nebula NGC 2440 :-)
